content: this is a listing for a crochet baby sweater - into the woods > you can find a free version of this > pattern on my blog croby patterns > however in the smallest size 0-6 > months only i sell beautifully > designed pdf patterns available for > you to download print out or use on a > phone tablet or computer in my > pattern shops on etsy ravelry and > love crafts thank you for your kind > support ❤️ free written pattern here 1 video tutorial here 2 you can find more of my patterns here https //www ravelry com/designers/croby-patterns > buy three patterns or more and get 20% > off on the entire purchase no coupon > is needed happy crocheting sizes 0 - 6 months 6 - 12 months **materials ** yarn fingering weight yarn - drops flora crochet hook 3 0 mm and 3 5 mm crochet hook you will also need stitch markers scissors yarn needle **stitches ** chain chain single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch half_double_crochet half_double_crochet work into back loops only blo **number of pages in pdf ** 5 **in the pdf ** written instructions step-by-step photo tutorial and video tutorial available on youtube **language ** english **crochet terms ** us crochet terms **skill level ** easy/medium **please note ** this pattern can be found with ads on my blog crobypatterns com and video tutorial on my youtube channel one size newborn only **policy** → no refunds on digital downloads → finished objects made with this pattern can be sold in a small scale in your small shop with handmade items or a craft fair mass production is strictly prohibited → this pattern may not be shared or redistributed copyright © 2023 croby patterns 1 https //crobypatterns com/into-the-woods-a-free-crochet-baby-sweater/ 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=6qsuuoxqxho&t=1s&ab_channel=crobypatterns
